sentences: istusin oma vankrikuuris, kus suure kraamikasti kaas oli lauaks, t√§is pabereid.
Osta mulle see kast mitmesuguse kraami.
context: The word 'kraami' is part of the genitive case form 'kraamikasti' which means 'of a stuff/thing container'. The base word appears to be related to containers or boxes ('kast'). In context, it refers to various items, belongings, or goods stored in a container. It's commonly used when talking about miscellaneous items that are kept together in some kind of box or storage space.
